titleStmt.title: A sermon about the government of the thoughts, preach'd before the King & Queen, at White-Hall, the 4th of March being the 2d Sunday in Lent, 1693/4 / by ... John, Lord Archbishop of York.
titleStmt.author: Sharp, John, 1645-1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Warren for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Half title: The Archbishop of York's sermon about the government of thoughts, before the King & Queen, at Whitehall, March iv, 1693/4.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
